snippet.title: Rescue Party: Live! Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Team up with your pals to rescue people from disasters in Rescue Party: Live!, a new chaotic co-op experience coming to Steam this fall!

Selecting from nine colourful rescue team volunteers, players can choose to brave the danger alone or with friends (online and locally), analysing the environment, gathering information and planning their approach. 

Across a variety of game events, disasters and terrain, no rescue mission will be the same!

🔥 Add to your Steam Wishlist: http://505.games/RescuePartyLiveAnnounce
🔥 Follow us on Twitter to stay up to date: https://twitter.com/RescuePartyLive

For behind the scenes details on all of 505's games, head to the official 505 Games Blog: http://www.505games.com/blog
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/505Games
Twitter: https://twitter.com/505_Games
